QuestData.Title: The Trainer's Challenge: Suchi the Sweet
QuestData.Description: Today you will face Suchi the Sweet in the training ring. Despite her sweet exterior, she is a tough opponent.$B$BShe attacks swiftly and surely, but such potent attacks can become tiring over time.$B$BIf you hope to defeat her, you will need to concentrate your damage when she is weakened.$B$BSpeak to Suchi to begin the duel. Good luck.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Suchi the Sweet, then defeat her.
